blogPost.excerpt: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
blogPost.body: B2B buyers are tired of the traditional sales process and want a B2C like buying experience. Deal Rooms transform your sales process to sell B2B buyers how they want to be sold. Open to close, deal rooms help your sales teams sell more and sell fast.
blogPost.title: Referenceable - Deal rooms create B2C like buying experiences for B2B buyers
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: B2B买家已经厌倦了传统的销售流程，他们希望获得类似B2C的购买体验。Deal Rooms将改变您的销售流程，以B2B买家想要的方式进行销售。从开放到关闭，交易室帮助您的销售团队卖得更多，卖得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室为B2B买家创造类似B2C的购买体验

localize.description: B2B買家已經厭倦了傳統的銷售流程，他們希望獲得類似B2C的購買體驗。Deal Rooms將改變您的銷售流程，以B2B買家想要的方式進行銷售。從開放到關閉，交易室幫助您的銷售團隊賣得更多，賣得更快。
localize.tagline: 交易室爲B2B買家創造類似B2C的購買體驗

previous.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
previous.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.

localize.description: Eco让你的钱重新为你工作。它是一个单一的余额，让你消费，发送，储蓄和赚钱在同一时间。赚取2.5-5%的余额，并在商家获得5%的现金回馈。而且，很快就可以支付账单和寄钱给朋友，获得更多奖励。
localize.tagline: 储蓄、消费、赚钱的一个简单平衡。

localize.description: Eco讓你的錢重新爲你工作。它是一個單一的餘額，讓你消費，發送，儲蓄和賺錢在同一時間。賺取2.5-5%的餘額，並在商家獲得5%的現金回饋。而且，很快就可以支付賬單和寄錢給朋友，獲得更多獎勵。
localize.tagline: 儲蓄、消費、賺錢的一個簡單平衡。

next.excerpt: Beam makes it easy to get paid to text your biggest fans. Send premium paid content, images, or videos directly to your monthly paying subscribers.
next.title: Beam - Get paid to delight your followers via text

localize.description: Beam让您轻松获得报酬，向您的忠实粉丝发送短信。直接向您的月度付费用户发送高级付费内容、图片或视频。
localize.tagline: 通过文字获得报酬，让您的追随者高兴

localize.description: Beam讓您輕鬆獲得報酬，向您的忠實粉絲髮送短信。直接向您的月度付費用戶發送高級付費內容、圖片或視頻。
localize.tagline: 通過文字獲得報酬，讓您的追隨者高興
